goals__remit: Clothes Aid is a social business and one of the largest, fully licensed commercial clothes collection companies in the UK. It prides itself on being fully transparent and follows industry guidance. Being members of the Institute of Fundraising and registered with the Fundraising Regulator, Clothes Aid follows the Code of Fundraising Practice without exception. It is governed by UK fundraising regulations concerning licensing and various UK Charities Acts and also by UK Charity Commission regulations concerning the collection and sale of used clothing.
relevant_communication: Meetings with relevant EU representative and stakeholders concerning trade relations with Ukraine.
